title: 六十甲子籤第三十七籤
subtitle: 屬土利年　四方皆宜

analysis.zh: 運氣來了，做事得意，身份地位也會變得顯要。你現在所做的事情都是好的，對別人也有好處。未來沒有什麼可以難得倒你的。作下好的決定，神明也會保佑你。現在正是運氣好，適合大展伸手的時候，只要作下對自己與別人都好的決定，什麼事情都不能阻礙你成功，而且神明也會保佑你順利。運氣來了，做事得意，身份地位也會變得顯要。你現在所做的事情都是好的，對別人也有好處。未來沒有什麼可以難得倒你的。作下好的決定，神明也會保佑你。
analysis.en: Luck has come and your status will be influential with pride. What you are doing is positive and benefits others. Nothing can stop you. With right decision, God will bless you.It is time to be on your mettle with good fortune. To make right decision for you and others and nothing won’t stop you because God will bless you.
analysis.jp: 運が来ると行いも得意気で、身分、地位も高まる。今のあなたの行いがすべて良い。他人に対しても有利になるでしょう。未来ではあなたにとって、難しい事がないでしょう。良い決定をすると、神明もあなたを守ってくれるでしょう。今はちょうど好運の時、大いに発揮の時だ。自分にも他人にも、良い決定をすれば、どんな事でもあなたの成功を阻害できないでしょう。神明もあなたが順調にできるように見守るでしょう。
analysis.reference: 1.正德君看呼綠牡丹開2.正德君戲李鳳姐凡事　有錢。拖尾。平安。作事　可成。有口舌。家事　克振家聲。。家運　居之平安。婚姻　好。求兒　好吉。六甲　先男後女。求財　漸有。功名　望後科。(身顯)歲君　平安治病　險不畏。祈平安。出外　平正。經商　峻發日新。來人　立即到。行舟　有利可得。移居　好吉。失物　難尋。求雨　不日到。官事　破財。結局。六畜　適宜吉昌。耕作　平平。有收。築室　清吉。墳墓　得其所哉。討海　和大利。漸得進。作塭　漸得利。魚苗　漸好。月令　漸好。尋人　盡心得回。遠信　佳音速至。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is that fortune is favorable and any decision taken in confidence will be safeguarded by divine blessing. The verses emphasize a smooth path forward, the value of beneficial action for oneself and others, and the assurance that obstacles will not impede progress.
1. Health
The poem’s tone of effortless success implies a state of physical and mental well‑being. When one is guided by confident decisions, the body’s natural resilience is enhanced, reducing the likelihood of illness. Maintain a balanced routine to support this auspicious flow of energy.
2. Love and Relationships
The lines suggest that positive deeds benefit both self and others, encouraging harmonious interaction. By making choices that consider the welfare of partners and friends, one cultivates trust and mutual respect. This creates a stable foundation for deepening emotional bonds.
3. Career and Ambition
A career path described as “無難事” conveys a lack of barriers, indicating that ambition can be pursued with fewer hindrances. Confidence in decision‑making aligns personal goals with organizational needs, yielding recognition and advancement. Continue to set clear objectives and act decisively to sustain this momentum.
4. Wealth and Finances
Financial prosperity is linked to the notion of “保清吉” – clean fortune secured by wise decisions. By allocating resources responsibly and avoiding rash speculation, one can preserve and grow wealth. Regular evaluation of financial plans will help maintain this steady growth.
5. Family and Harmony
The poem’s focus on mutual benefit extends to family life, suggesting that harmonious relations will flourish. Prioritizing family needs alongside personal aspirations ensures a balanced domestic environment. Regular communication and shared activities reinforce this cohesion.
6. Social Connections and Reputation
Public perception is highlighted through the imagery of status becoming “顯要”. By acting ethically and in the interest of others, one earns respect and a positive reputation. Nurturing networks through genuine outreach will amplify this social capital, opening doors for future collaborations.
